item.title: The Good Whale
item.description:
I just finished Good Whale, a Serial podcast about the orca that starred in Free Willy. It’s an emotional listen.

Before you continue, know that I’m about to spoil the story. If you’re interested in listening to the podcast, stop here.

It takes six episodes to learn what happens to Keiko. Here it is in one paragraph:

In the early 1990s, Keiko was captured from his pod as a calf and shipped to a Mexican theme park where he learned to do tricks for frozen fish. Hollywood found him and made him a star in the movie Free Willy. After the movie’s release, a news expos√© revealed his poor living conditions, and activists spent a decade and millions of dollars trying to reintroduce him to the wild. They moved him to a larger tank in Oregon, then flew him to Iceland where he was originally captured.
